name.japanese: ロングリングロングランド

description: An unusual archipelago consisting of ten islands that connect during low tide, allowing passage on foot. The island is known for its elongated animals and plants, and is the seventh island visited by the Straw Hat Pirates in the Grand Line.

keyEvents.title: Admiral Aokiji Appears at Long Ring Long Land
keyEvents.description: Marine Admiral Aokiji appears at Long Ring Long Land and confronts the Straw Hat Pirates, demonstrating his overwhelming power.
keyEvents.significance: The location becomes the site of one of the Straw Hats' most hopeless battles and the first time they encounter an Admiral.

keyEvents.title: Ocean Frozen by Ice Age
keyEvents.description: Aokiji freezes a massive section of the ocean surrounding Long Ring Long Land using his Ice Age technique.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the scale of an Admiral's power, permanently altering the landscape temporarily.

statusHistory.reason: The archipelago remains a natural formation in the Grand Line
